description:
Change of use, conversion and alterations of existing vacant hospital buildings to provide 70 residential flats comprised of 48 one bedroom flats, 20 two bedroom and two studio flats. 

 Applicants Plan Nos: 2512/TP/01C-03C,05C-07C,08A-11A,20A,21C
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
